SELECT count(1) FROM bas_die WHERE fg_valid = '0'
AND name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND fg_active = #{fgActive}
AND icd like concat('%',#{icd},'%')
AND pinyin like concat('%',#{pinyin},'%')
AND (name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or icd like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or pinyin like concat('%',#{keywords},'%'))

SELECT bd.id_die, bd.name, bd.cd_dieclass,bdc.name as cdDieclassText, bd.icd, bd.pinyin, bd.fg_active, bd.fg_valid, bd.sort, bd.creator, bd.gmt_create, bd.operator, bd.gmt_modify FROM bas_die bd left join bas_die_class bdc on bd.cd_dieclass = bdc.cd WHERE bd.fg_valid = '0'
AND bd.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND bd.fg_active = #{fgActive}
AND bd.icd like concat('%',#{icd},'%')
AND bd.pinyin like concat('%',#{pinyin},'%')
AND (bd.name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or bd.icd like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or bd.pinyin like concat('%',#{keywords},'%'))
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

and cd_par = #{id}
and (cd_par is null or cd_par = '')
and (cd_par is null or cd_par = '')
and cd_par is not null

SELECT id_dieclass, cd AS id , cd_par AS pId , name, fg_active, 1 as is_parent FROM bas_die_class WHERE fg_active = '1'
and (cd_par is null or cd_par = '')
and cd_par is not null
AND cd_par = #{mainCatalogueId}
AND name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT id_dieclass, name, cd, cd_par, icd_b, icd_e, fg_active, fg_valid, sort, creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify FROM bas_die_class WHERE id_dieclass = #{idDieClass}
select count(1) from bas_die_class where cd = #{cd} and fg_valid = '0'
SELECT id_die, CONCAT('die-', id_die) AS id , cd_dieclass AS pId , name, fg_active, 0 as is_parent FROM bas_die WHERE fg_active = '1'
